key.name: idle-delay
key.summary: Time before session is considered idle
key.description: The number of seconds of inactivity before the session is considered idle.

key.name: session-name
key.description: The name of the session to use. Known values are "gnome" and "gnome-fallback".

key.name: session-manager-uses-logind
key.summary: Whether or not cinnamon-session uses logind to suspend/hibernate/shutdown/restart (usually from the shutdown dialog)
key.description: If true, it uses logind. Otherwise it uses consolekit to shutdown/restart and upower to suspend/hibernate. It is only compatible with upower 0.9 and lower versions (not 0.99 or later).

key.name: settings-daemon-uses-logind
key.summary: Whether or not cinnamon-settings-daemon uses logind to suspend/hibernate/shutdown (either from media-keys or power-manager)
key.description: If true, it uses logind for all three actions. Otherwise it uses consolekit for shutdown and upower for suspend/hibernate.
